title: spread in the network
extract: Definition of the Expected Force. The expected force is a node property derived from local network topology, independent of the rest of the network or any specific spreading process. It is formally defined as follows. Consider a network with one infected node i and all remaining nodes susceptible.Mar 2, 2015
